mapper.select: select R1.* FROM( SELECT companyseq, imgurl, business, enddate, oneintro, mainfield, languages, companyname, location, salary, target FROM COMPANY02 order by companyseq desc ) R1 LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{startList}
SELECT COMPANYSEQ,COMPANYNAME,IMGURL,ONEINTRO,BUSINESS FROM COMPANY02 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 20
SELECT COMPANYNAME,BUSINESS,TARGET,LANGUAGES FROM COMPANY02 WHERE GROUPNO=#{GROUPNO}
SELECT COMPANYSEQ,COMPANYNAME,IMGURL,ONEINTRO,BUSINESS FROM COMPANY02 WHERE BUSINESS LIKE CONCAT('%','웹','%') ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4
SELECT COMPANYSEQ,COMPANYNAME,IMGURL,ONEINTRO,BUSINESS FROM COMPANY02 WHERE BUSINESS LIKE CONCAT('%','프론트','%') ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4
SELECT COMPANYSEQ,COMPANYNAME,IMGURL,ONEINTRO,BUSINESS FROM COMPANY02 WHERE BUSINESS LIKE CONCAT('%','백엔드','%') ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4
